items.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.Ingrid is selling pozole, chile rellenos, and chocoflan next weekend....
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Ingrid is selling pozole, chile rellenos, and chocoflan next weekend. She’s the founder of @no.mas.chuecos, a grassroots initiative that educates people about t...he dangers of using false documents. That work contributed to Governor Polis’s decision to grant her a pardon last year, but she’s still fighting her immigration case. Ingrid has spent over half her life in the U.S., but in order to stay with her children, she’s had to live in sanctuary for the last four years. Since she’s unable to leave the church to work, she supports her family by selling artisanal goods from Peru & cooking for food sales like this one. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

See More

items.title: Rep. Joe Neguse, D-Colo., and his colleagues on the House...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Rep. Joe Neguse, D-Colo., and his colleagues on the House Judiciary Committee on Wednesday evening sent a letter to Vice President Pence asking him to invoke the 25th Amendment and remove Donald Trump from office.

“For the sake of our democracy, we emphatically urge you to invoke the 25th Amendment and begin the process of removing President Trump from power,” the lawmakers wrote. “President Trump has shown time and again that he is unwilling to protect our Democracy and carry out the duties of the office.” https://bit.ly/35eNzsy

items.title: Ingrid is selling pozole, chile rellenos, and chocoflan next...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Ingrid is selling pozole, chile rellenos, and chocoflan next weekend. She’s the founder of @no.mas.chuecos, a grassroots initiative that educates people about the dangers of using false documents. That work contributed to Governor Polis’s decision to grant her a pardon last year, but she’s still fighting her immigration case. Ingrid has spent over half her life in the U.S., but in order to stay with her children, she’s had to live in sanctuary for the last four years. Since she’s unable to leave the church to work, she supports her family by selling artisanal goods from Peru & cooking for food sales like this one. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

items.title: Is it too late for a Spotify wrapped rip-off? We wanted to share...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Is it too late for a Spotify wrapped rip-off? We wanted to share all the work we did with the Solidarity Meals program in 2020 and celebrate that success with the community that made it possible. Thank you, thank you, thank you. To kickoff sales in 2021, Lupe is selling gorditas. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

+7

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Lupe with her two daughters. She’s selling gorditas this weekend to raise money both for her husband’s appeal and an upcoming medical procedure. You can support her family by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co (link in bio)

items.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.The Solidarity Meals schedule is up for the new year! We’ll be selling...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

The Solidarity Meals schedule is up for the new year! We’ll be selling gorditas, pupusas, sandwiches, chile relleno, pozole, burritos, & more this month. Orders for gorditas next week are open at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
